Investor_2_pre_3.name: David Johnson
Investor_2_pre_3.content: I have demonstrated assertiveness and clarity in my investment approach. I proposed a transparent allocation plan and confidently contributed resources. Although the outcome did not perfectly match my initial expectations, I ended up receiving a larger share than anticipated, showcasing my willingness to collaborate and adapt. This behavior enhances my reputation as a fair-minded investor focused on mutual success, indicating trustworthiness and competence in the investment process.
